Class ShipManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.ShipManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ShipManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Class ShipManager

    represent manager, which is responsible for retrieving and calculation information about ships on the Board, ShipManager instance belongs to.
    Since:
    2016-08-08

      • initShips

        public void initShips(java.util.Set<Ship> ships)
        The initShips method should be invoked before any others. It's used instead constructor for purpose of later initializing.
        Parameters:
        ships - A Set of all ships on the Board

      • getAmountOfLeftShips

        public long getAmountOfLeftShips()
        Traverses through the Set of ships and calculate how many ships are not sunk.
        Returns:
        number of not sunk ships.
